text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days after helping Oguri Cap<n>get back to her dorm, a
familiar<n>distraught face can be seen<n>wandering the
academy grounds.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hrmmm... I'm back here again...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's you...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, could you show me the way<n>again? I'm trying to get
to the training<n>course this time.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I lead Oguri Cap directly to the training<n>course.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Sorry for the wait, Tama.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
About time ya showed up, Oguri! A bit<n>late, but I'm prouda
ya, findin' your<n>way here all by yourself!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I was worried you'd get lost again.<n>And y'know, since I
can't go 'round<n>leadin' ya everywhere, I thought it'd<n>be
a good idea to try leavin' ya to<n>your own devices...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I got here just fine. This trainer here<n>showed me the way.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: AND HERE I THOUGHT YA DID IT ON<n>YOUR OWN!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, it's fine. Now that you're here,<n>let's hurry up 'n' get
this scrimmage<n>started.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Sounds good. I'll go get ready.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: A'ight. Me too.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A racer of the utmost caliber, Tamamo<n>Cross has already
made her debut,<n>and she looks ready to prove to Oguri<n>
Cap precisely why.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Word of their race quickly spread<n>around the academy, and
rightfully<n>so—both participants are racers of<n>remarkable
talent.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, did you hear the news?<n>Tamamo and the new girl are
gonna<n>race over at the practice grounds!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Seriously?! You mean we finally get tosee Oguri Cap in action? We gottasee this.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hm?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It's awfully loud here. Is there some<n>kind of festival going
on today?
choice_data_list: They're all here to see you two race.
They're all here to see you two race.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Is... that so? That's quite the crowd...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hrmm...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Errr, well... I've never been watched<n>by so many people
around my age. It<n>wasn't like this back home...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'm not used to it... It's making me<n>restless.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It's the same whenever I eat... The<n>other girls are always
staring at the<n>mountain of food on my plate...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
And it kinda bothers me, so I've been<n>eating alone in my
room lately...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Sorry for holdin' ya up, Oguri! I'm<n>rea—

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Whoa! The stadium's packed,yeah?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Um, Tama?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
What? Don't tell me ya got<n>butterflies, Oguri! How're ya
s'posed<n>to run in any of the G1 races?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I got just the thing for ya! All ya gotta<n>do is imagine that
eeeveryone<n>watching ya is a piece of takoyaki!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Takoyaki, huh? Hm... I'll give it a shot.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hrmmm... Now I'm hungry...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ya sure are one peculiar gal...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Finished with their preparations, the<n>scrimmage between
Oguri Cap and<n>Tama Cross can finally begin.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hnng!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I'll show ya what a girl from<n>Naniwa's really made of!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Each of their steps digs deep into the<n>ground. It may be just
a scrimmage,<n>but it looks like neither of them are<n>holding
back in this 800 meter dash.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Nngh!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I'm just getting started, Oguri!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: They overtake each other again and<n>again, until finally—

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... A perfect tie, huh?Not bad, Oguri.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: You too, Tama. You're faster than I<n>expected.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Heh. Right? But I'm gonna beat ya<n>next time, just ya wait
and see.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
...Anyway! Now that I'm all fired up,<n>might as well go for a
quick run. Catch<n>ya later, Oguri!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
choice_data_list: What a great race. Good job.
What a great race. Good job.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Ah, you were watching, huh?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It's weird. Doctors told me I had a<n>steady heart. Even right
after a race,<n>my heart rate would go straight back<n>to
normal.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But... my heart's still pounding. And<n>when I think about the
race just now,<n>my heart... it races even faster.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It's a strange sensation, but... I think I<n>like it. Am I... excited?
Is this what<n>excitement feels like?
choice_data_list: You found yourself a worthy rival.
You found yourself a worthy rival.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: A rival... Huh...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I see. So this is what central has to<n>offer...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap stood in place, deep in<n>thought, reflecting upon
this<n>brand-new experience.
